channel.title: Different Voice recognition OR recognition for greater time – Politepix

item.title: Different Voice recognition OR recognition for greater time
item.dc:creator: Nawazish Abbas
item.description:
Dear all , kindly help me, i am developing my final year project on Voice Recognition.
When i speak some phonetics words like gymnastic etc it recognize but when A B C ,,, it does not well enough .
As well as it recognize on its own way , some time it never listen correct any word

item.title: Reply To: Different Voice recognition OR recognition for greater time
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome Nawazish,

Unfortunately this is an issue with all speech recognition engines. You can read more about it by searching these forums for the word “letters”. The search field is in the right-side column of this page.
